>>37762591
Important things to take away from that:
- we've found a catherdral guarded by obsidian dudes
- the consultation mentions "Obsidian Pegasus." that needs defeating

On that note, our scimitar ain't useful here versus obsidian dudes. If we make friendly with the other party and none of them can identify our pickaxe we might want to just head back for now

>>37762641
I vote we don't do that until we know we're ready to be involved with the raid since they may well try to beat us to it otherwise

Unrelated tangent: reckon we can use that celestial gem to unlock our mystery ability? The whole 'feels the same' thing and all
